deleteAllDataTitle: ¿Are you sure you want to delete all data?

required.null: This field is required and cannot contain only spaces.
required.startsWithABlankSpace: This field cannot begin with a blank space.

email.invalid: The email format is not valid.

range.minGreaterThanMax: The minimum value cannot be greater than or equal to the maximum value.
range.minOptimoInvalid: The optimal minimum value must be greater than the minimum value and less than the maximum value.
range.maxOptimoInvalid: The optimal maximum value must be greater than the optimal minimum value and less than the maximum value.
range.minOptimoGreaterThanMaxOptimo: The optimal minimum value must be less than the optimal maximum value.
range.maxOptimoLessThanMinOptimo: The optimal maximum value must be greater than the optimal minimum value.
range.minMaxInvalid: Both the minimum and maximum value must be greater or equal than 0.
range.invalidCategoricalLength: There must be at least 2 defined values.
range.invalidTypeObjectLength: You must select at least one object type.

granularity.invalid: The granularity value must be a positive number.
